item.title: 汝亦知射乎
item.author: liuzh66@gmail.com (刘征 Martin Liu)
item.description: 康肃问曰：“汝亦知射乎？吾射不亦精乎？”翁曰：“无他，但手熟尔。”康肃忿然曰：“尔安敢轻吾射！”翁曰：“以我酌油知之。”乃取一葫芦置于地，以

item.title: OTRS FAQ 1.5.3 : you have six reasons to use it
item.author: liuzh66@gmail.com (刘征 Martin Liu)
item.description: I have Christopher T. Kuhn Blog’s RSS feed in my blackberry. That’s the way I following with OTRS project. Christoper do the best job to explain new features and updated s. I did not try out OTRS FAQ 1.5.3 yet, but it look great from Chrisopher’s post.知识库、解决方案库或者KB的建设往往被
